Dashboard.title: Dashboard
Dashboard.message: You are logged in! This is a protected page.
Dashboard.sessionManagementDescription: Ready to sign out? Your session will be securely terminated.

error.title: Sign In Error
error.accountAlreadyExistsDescription: An account with this email address already exists using a different sign-in method.
error.accountAlreadyExistsDetails: You previously created an account with email and password. To link your Google account, please sign in with your email first.
error.accessDeniedDescription: You do not have permission to sign in.
error.accessDeniedDetails: This could be due to account restrictions or policy violations.
error.configurationErrorDescription: There is a problem with the server configuration.
error.configurationErrorDetails: Please contact support if this issue persists.
error.authenticationErrorDescription: An unexpected error occurred during sign in.
error.authenticationErrorDetails: Please try again or contact support if the problem continues.
error.oauthCallbackErrorDescription: There was a problem connecting with your OAuth provider.
error.oauthCallbackErrorDetails: This could be due to network issues, provider downtime, or configuration problems. Please try signing in again.
error.signInWithEmailFirst: Sign in with your email and password first
error.linkGoogleAccount: Link your Google account from there

Registration.title: Create Your Account
Registration.subtitle: Join us today and get started
Registration.agreeToTerms: I agree to the Terms of Service and Privacy Policy
Registration.errorEmailExists: An account with this email already exists
Registration.errorWeakPassword: Password must be at least 8 characters long
Registration.errorInvalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address

Account.title: Account Settings
Account.subtitle: Manage your account and preferences
Account.deleteAccountWarning: Once you delete your account, there is no going back. Please be certain.
Account.confirmDeletion: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
Account.confirmDeletionText: This action cannot be undone. All your data will be permanently deleted.
Account.accountDeleted: Your account has been successfully deleted
Account.deletionFailed: Failed to delete account. Please try again.
Account.addPasswordDescription: Set a password to enable email/password authentication as a backup for your Google account.
Account.changePasswordDescription: Update your current password for enhanced security.

TwoFactor.tooManyAttempts: Too many failed attempts. Please sign in again.
TwoFactor.invalidCode: Invalid verification code. Please try again.
TwoFactor.sessionExpired: Session expired. Please sign in again.
TwoFactor.metaDescription: Complete your sign-in with two-factor authentication
TwoFactor.signInFailure: Failed to complete sign-in. Please try again.
TwoFactor.unexpectedError: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
TwoFactor.title: Two-Factor Authentication
TwoFactor.backupCodeInstructions: Enter one of your backup codes to complete sign-in
TwoFactor.verificationCodeInstructions: Enter the verification code from your authenticator app
TwoFactor.backupCodeNote: Each backup code can only be used once
